name: Argentina
historySummary: Argentina is a South American country known for its diverse landscapes, culture, and history. It is famous for tango dancing and its beef production.
joke: Why did the Argentine soccer team go to the bank? To get their goalie savings!

name: Bolivia
historySummary: Bolivia is a landlocked South American country known for its Andean landscapes, indigenous culture, and history. It was named after Simon Bolivar.
joke: Why did the Bolivian chef become a mountain climber? Because they wanted to 'peak' the culinary world!

name: Brazil
historySummary: Brazil is the largest South American country known for its Amazon rainforest, diverse culture, and vibrant Carnival festival. It was a Portuguese colony.
joke: Why did the Brazilian soccer player bring string to the game? Because they wanted to tie the score!

name: Chile
historySummary: Chile is a South American country known for its long coastline, diverse geography, and wine production. It was home to ancient indigenous cultures.
joke: Why did the Chilean chef start a vineyard? Because they wanted to 'wine'd down and relax!

name: Colombia
historySummary: Colombia is a South American country known for its coffee production, biodiversity, and cultural heritage. It was named after Christopher Columbus.
joke: Why did the Colombian musician start a band? Because they wanted to 'riddim' the world with their music!

name: Ecuador
historySummary: Ecuador is a South American country known for its diverse landscapes, including the Amazon rainforest and the Galápagos Islands. It is on the equator.
joke: Why did the Ecuadorian explorer always carry a compass? Because they wanted to 'point' the way to adventure!

name: Guyana
historySummary: Guyana is a South American country known for its lush rainforests, diverse culture, and British colonial history. It is the only English-speaking country in South America.
joke: Why did the Guyanese farmer bring a ladder to the field? Because they heard the crops were 'up'-standing!

name: Paraguay
historySummary: Paraguay is a landlocked South American country known for its indigenous culture and the Paraguay River. It is one of the least densely populated countries in South America.
joke: Why did the Paraguayan soccer player bring a ladder to the game? Because they wanted to 'Paraguayan-climb' the ranks!

name: Peru
historySummary: Peru is a South American country known for its ancient Inca civilization, Machu Picchu, and diverse geography. It was once the center of the Inca Empire.
joke: Why did the Peruvian chef start a restaurant? Because they wanted to 'Peru-se' the best flavors!

name: Suriname
historySummary: Suriname is a small South American country known for its diverse culture, Dutch colonial history, and rainforests. It was formerly known as Dutch Guiana.
joke: Why did the Surinamese fisherman always carry a pencil? In case he caught a draw-fish!

name: Uruguay
historySummary: Uruguay is a small South American country known for its progressive policies, beautiful beaches, and cultural heritage. It was the first country in the world to legalize cannabis.
joke: Why did the Uruguayan soccer player bring a ladder to the game? Because they wanted to 'Uruguayan-climb' the ranks!

name: Venezuela
historySummary: Venezuela is a South American country known for its oil reserves, diverse landscapes, and cultural heritage. It was named after Venice by explorer Amerigo Vespucci.
joke: Why did the Venezuelan musician start a band? Because they wanted to 'venez-wail-a' great melody!
